Name: De La Louisiane #1
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Nick & Nora glass .
Prepare garnish of lemon zest twist.
EXPRESS lemon zest twist over the cocktail and use as garnish.
Review: Whiskey with hints of honey and spice.
History: A variation on the classic rye-based La Louisiane cocktail , first served in the early 1930s at Restaurant de la Louisiane in New Orleans, USA.
Nutrition: One serving of De La Louisiane #1 contains 145 calories
